## BjjProvider.newPrivateKeyFromSeed() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

generates a baby jub jub key from a seed phrase

**Signature:**

```typescript
newPrivateKeyFromSeed(seed: Uint8Array): Promise<KmsKeyId>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  seed | Uint8Array | byte array seed |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[KmsKeyId](./js-sdk.kmskeyid.md)&gt;

kms key identifier
